reasoning: Reporting incidence of ~280 per 100k person-years for new onset panic disorder. Lifetime prevalence ~2.7% (2700 per 100k) based on epidemiological surveys from early 2000s.
source: Kessler RC et al. (2006). The epidemiology of panic attacks, panic disorder, and agoraphobia in the National Comorbidity Survey Replication. Arch Gen Psychiatry. 63(4):415-424
